verses.t: Rebuke{G1969} not{G3361} an elder{G4245}, but{G235} intreat{G3870} him as{G5613} a father{G3962}; and the younger men{G3501} as{G5613} brethren{G80};
The elder women{G4245} as{G5613} mothers{G3384}; the younger{G3501} as{G5613} sisters{G79}, with{G1722} all{G3956} purity{G47}.
Honour{G5091} widows{G5503} that are{G3689} widows{G5503} indeed{G3689}.

But{G1161} if{G1487} any{G5100} widow{G5503} have{G2192} children{G5043} or{G2228} nephews{G1549}, let them learn{G3129} first{G4412} to shew piety{G2151} at home{G3624}, and{G2532} to{G591} requite{G287} their parents{G3588}: for{G1063} that{G5124} is{G2076} good{G2570} and{G2532} acceptable{G587} before{G1799} God{G3588}.

Now{G1161} she that{G3588} is{G3689} a widow{G5503} indeed{G3689}, and{G2532} desolate{G3443}, trusteth{G1679} in{G1909} God{G3588}, and{G2532} continueth in{G4357} supplications{G3588} and{G2532} prayers{G3588} night{G3571} and{G2532} day{G2250}.
But{G1161} she that{G3588} liveth in pleasure{G4684} is dead{G2348} while she liveth{G2198}.
And{G2532} these things{G5023} give in charge{G3853}, that{G2443} they may be{G5600} blameless{G423}.

But{G1161} if{G1487} any{G5100} provide{G4306} not{G3756} for{G4306} his own{G2398}, and{G2532} specially{G3122} for those of his own house{G3609}, he hath denied{G720} the faith{G3588}, and{G2532} is{G2076} worse{G5501} than an infidel{G571}.
Let{G2639} not{G3361} a widow{G5503} be taken into the number{G2639} under{G1640} threescore{G1835} years old{G2094}, having been{G1096} the wife{G1135} of one{G1520} man{G435},

Well reported of{G3140} for{G1722} good{G2570} works{G2041}; if{G1487} she have brought up children{G5044}, if{G1487} she have lodged strangers{G3580}, if{G1487} she have washed{G3538} the saints'{G40} feet{G4228}, if{G1487} she have relieved{G1884} the afflicted{G2346}, if{G1487} she have diligently followed{G1872} every{G3956} good{G18} work{G2041}.
But{G1161} the younger{G3501} widows{G5503} refuse{G3868}: for{G1063} when{G3752} they have begun to wax wanton against{G2691} Christ{G3588}, they will{G2309} marry{G1060};
Having{G2192} damnation{G2917}, because{G3754} they have cast off{G114} their{G3588} first{G4413} faith{G4102}.

And{G1161} withal{G260} they learn{G3129} to be idle{G692}, wandering about{G4022} from house to house{G3588}; and{G1161} not{G3756} only{G3440} idle{G692}, but{G235} tattlers{G5397} also{G2532} and{G2532} busybodies{G4021}, speaking{G2980} things which{G3588} they ought{G1163} not{G3361}.

I will{G1014} therefore{G3767} that{G1060} the younger women{G3501} marry{G1060}, bear children{G5041}, guide the house{G3616}, give{G1325} none{G3367} occasion{G874} to the adversary{G480} to speak reproachfully{G3059}.
For{G1063} some{G5100} are{G1624} already{G2235} turned aside{G1624} after{G3694} Satan{G3588}.

If{G1487} any{G5100} man{G4103} or{G2228} woman{G4103} that believeth{G4103} have{G2192} widows{G5503}, let them relieve{G1884} them{G846}, and{G2532} let{G916} not{G3361} the church{G3588} be charged{G916}that{G2443} it may relieve{G1884} them that{G3588} are{G3689} widows{G5503} indeed{G3689}.

Let{G515} the elders{G4245} that rule{G4291} well{G2573} be counted worthy{G515} of double{G1362} honour{G5092}, especially{G3122} they who labour{G2872} in{G1722} the word{G3056} and{G2532} doctrine{G1319}.

For{G1063} the scripture{G3588} saith{G3004}, Thou shalt{G5392} not{G3756} muzzle{G5392} the ox{G1016} that treadeth out the corn{G248}. And{G2532}, The labourer{G3588} is worthy{G514} of his{G846} reward{G3588}.

Against{G2596} an elder{G4245} receive{G3858} not{G3361} an accusation{G2724}, but{G1622} before{G1909} two{G1417} or{G2228} three{G5140} witnesses{G3144}.The KJV seems to treat EKTOS EI MH as one expression as renders it simply as "but", leaving me no choice but to tag only EKTOS
Them that sin{G264} rebuke{G1651} before{G1799} all{G3956}, that{G2443} others{G3062} also{G2532} may{G2192} fear{G5401}.

I charge{G1263} thee before{G1799} God{G3588}, and{G2532} the Lord{G2962} Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547}, and{G2532} the elect{G1588} angels{G32}, that{G2443} thou observe{G5442} these things{G5023} without{G5565} preferring one before another{G4299}, doing{G4160} nothing{G3367} by{G2596} partiality{G4346}.
Lay{G2007} hands{G5495} suddenly{G5030} on{G2007} no man{G3367}, neither{G3366} be partaker of{G2841} other men's{G245} sins{G266}: keep{G5083} thyself{G4572} pure{G53}.
Drink{G5202} no longer{G3371} water{G5202}, but{G235} use{G5530} a little{G3641} wine{G3631} for{G1223} thy{G4675} stomach's{G3588} sake{G1223} and{G2532} thine{G4675} often{G4437} infirmities{G769}.
Some{G5100} men's{G444} sins{G3588} are{G1526} open beforehand{G4271}, going before{G4254} to{G1519} judgment{G2920}; and{G1161} some{G5100} men they follow after{G1872}.
Likewise{G5615} also{G2532} the good{G2570} works{G2041} of some are{G2076} manifest beforehand{G4271}; and{G2532} they that are{G2192} otherwise{G247} can{G1410}not{G3756} be hid{G2928}.
